hero.title: Tranquilo

hero.description: Discover a world of calm and beauty in the heart of North Hurghada, where modern luxury meets authentic Egyptian hospitality.

passion.title: Born from Passion
passion.description: We are passionate about traveling and meeting new people. In 2023, we decided to create our luxury villa in North Hurghada, a place where tranquility meets sophistication.

vision.title: A Vision Realized
vision.description: After months of careful planning, we fell in love with this peaceful location in North Hurghada. Every detail has been thoughtfully designed to create an authentic and welcoming space.

dream.title: A Dream Come True
dream.description: We worked with skilled local artisans to bring our vision to life. Using premium materials and modern architecture, we created a haven where guests feel at home, away from the hustle and bustle of city life.

parallax.title: Experience Tranquility
parallax.subtitle: Where luxury meets the Red Sea, creating unforgettable moments of peace and beauty.

features.title: Why Choose Tranquilo?
features.subtitle: Modern luxury villa designed for ultimate comfort and relaxation

capacity.title: Perfect Capacity
capacity.description: Our villa comfortably accommodates guests with spacious rooms and luxurious amenities for the perfect getaway.

luxury.title: Hotel-Level Service
luxury.description: Enjoy the comfort of a private villa with the luxury of hotel services, including housekeeping and concierge assistance.

location.title: Prime Location
location.description: Located in North Hurghada with easy access to the Red Sea, offering the perfect blend of tranquility and convenience.

owner.title: Meet Your Host
owner.description: Hello! I'm Nabil, your host at Tranquilo Hurghada. I'm passionate about hospitality and creating unforgettable experiences for our guests. Having lived and traveled extensively, I understand what makes a perfect getaway. I'm here to ensure your stay is nothing short of extraordinary.
owner.name: Nabil Laaouina

built.title: Built with Love in 2025
built.description: Our villa was completed in 2025 after careful construction by skilled local artisans. We are proud of what we've achieved together - a space that combines modern luxury with authentic Egyptian charm.

cta.title: Ready for Your Perfect Getaway?
cta.subtitle: Don't wait any longer. Come and discover this haven of tranquility where you can recharge and enjoy moments of pure relaxation.

items.villa: Stylish, fully furnished villa with kitchen-free concept and private pool
items.pool: Daily pool maintenance and cleaning service
items.transfer: Free airport pickup and drop-off service

items.activities: Water sports, diving, and adventure activities

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.details: 50% deposit required upon booking confirmation. Remaining balance due 30 days before arrival. We accept major credit cards, bank transfers, and PayPal.

cancellation.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellation.details: Free cancellation up to 14 days before arrival. Cancellations within 14 days are subject to a 50% charge. No refund for cancellations within 72 hours of arrival.

checkin.title: Check-in
checkin.details: Check-in time is from 3:00 PM onwards. Early check-in may be available upon request and subject to availability.

checkout.title: Check-out
checkout.details: Check-out time is until 11:00 AM. Late check-out may be available upon request for an additional fee.

rules.smoking: No smoking inside the villa. Designated outdoor smoking areas available.
rules.parties: No loud parties or events. Quiet hours from 10:00 PM to 8:00 AM.
rules.pets: Pets are not allowed in the villa.
rules.noise: Please respect neighbors and maintain reasonable noise levels.
rules.capacity: Maximum occupancy: 10 guests. Additional guests not permitted.
rules.pool: Pool usage at your own risk. Children must be supervised at all times.
rules.damages: Guests are responsible for any damages during their stay.

gettingThere.title: How to Get to the Villa
gettingThere.subtitle: Transportation options to Tranquilo Hurghada

airport.title: From Hurghada Airport
airport.details: Hurghada International Airport is 25 minutes away by car. We provide complimentary airport transfers for all guests.

transfer.title: Complimentary Transfer
transfer.details: Our professional drivers will meet you at the airport with a welcome sign and transport you directly to the villa in comfort.

taxi.title: Taxi & Private Transport
taxi.details: Licensed taxis available at the airport. Journey takes approximately 25-30 minutes. Cost ranges from 200-300 EGP ($6-10 USD).

driving.title: Self-Driving
driving.details: Car rental available at the airport. Villa has private parking. GPS coordinates provided upon booking confirmation.

destination.title: Destination Hurghada
destination.subtitle: Discover the magic of the Red Sea
destination.description: Hurghada is Egypt's premier Red Sea destination, renowned for its crystal-clear waters, vibrant coral reefs, and year-round sunshine. Our villa is perfectly positioned to enjoy both the tranquil beaches and exciting activities this magical destination offers.

highlights.title: Why Hurghada?
highlights.redSea: World-class diving and snorkeling in pristine coral reefs
highlights.weather: Perfect climate with 300+ days of sunshine annually
highlights.diving: Access to some of the world's best dive sites
highlights.culture: Rich Egyptian culture and Bedouin heritage

marina.title: Hurghada Marina
marina.subtitle: Modern waterfront destination
marina.description: A vibrant waterfront promenade featuring luxury yachts, international restaurants, cafes, and boutique shopping. Perfect for evening strolls and dining with marina views.
marina.highlights: Yacht charters, fine dining, shopping, entertainment

oldTown.title: Old Town Hurghada (El Dahar)
oldTown.subtitle: Authentic Egyptian experience
oldTown.description: Explore traditional Egyptian culture in the historic heart of Hurghada. Visit local markets, traditional restaurants, and experience authentic Egyptian hospitality.
oldTown.highlights: Traditional souks, local cuisine, cultural sites, authentic crafts
oldTown.tips: Best visited in the evening when temperatures are cooler

elGouna.title: El Gouna
elGouna.subtitle: Venice of the Red Sea
elGouna.description: A luxury resort town built on lagoons, featuring championship golf courses, luxury hotels, and upscale dining. Known for its unique architecture and sophisticated atmosphere.
elGouna.highlights: Golf courses, luxury dining, nightlife, water sports

desertSafari.title: Eastern Desert Safari
desertSafari.subtitle: Adventure in the Egyptian desert
desertSafari.description: Experience the magic of the Eastern Desert with quad biking, camel rides, Bedouin village visits, and unforgettable sunset views over the Red Sea mountains.

snorkeling.title: Snorkeling & Diving Sites
snorkeling.subtitle: Underwater paradise
snorkeling.description: Discover world-renowned dive sites including Giftun Island, Abu Ramada, and the famous shipwrecks. Perfect for both beginners and experienced divers.

shopping.title: Shopping in Hurghada
shopping.subtitle: From traditional to modern
shopping.description: Explore traditional souks for authentic crafts, spices, and textiles, or visit modern shopping centers for international brands and dining.

redSeaFestival.title: Red Sea International Film Festival
redSeaFestival.subtitle: Annual cultural celebration
redSeaFestival.description: A prestigious international film festival showcasing cinema from the Arab world and beyond. Features screenings, workshops, and cultural events.
redSeaFestival.location: Various venues across Hurghada and El Gouna

divingCompetition.title: International Diving Championships
divingCompetition.subtitle: World-class underwater sports
divingCompetition.description: Annual diving competitions attracting professionals and enthusiasts from around the world. Spectacular underwater photography and videography contests.
divingCompetition.when: Typically held in spring and autumn seasons

culturalNights.title: Traditional Cultural Nights
culturalNights.subtitle: Authentic Egyptian entertainment
culturalNights.description: Experience traditional Egyptian folklore, Sufi dancing, and Bedouin music. Many hotels and cultural centers host regular performances.
culturalNights.schedule: Usually Thursday and Friday evenings at various venues

ramadan.title: Ramadan 2025
ramadan.subtitle: Sacred month of reflection
ramadan.description: Experience the spiritual atmosphere of Ramadan in Egypt. Special Iftar dinners, traditional celebrations, and unique cultural experiences available.
ramadan.experience: Traditional Iftar meals, evening prayers, special cultural programs

nightlife.title: Hurghada Nightlife
nightlife.subtitle: Evening entertainment
nightlife.description: From rooftop bars overlooking the Red Sea to traditional shisha cafes and live music venues, Hurghada offers diverse nighttime entertainment.

festivals.title: Local Festivals & Events
festivals.subtitle: Year-round celebrations
festivals.description: Hurghada hosts various festivals throughout the year including music festivals, food celebrations, and cultural events celebrating Egyptian heritage.
